titleStmt.title: Seasonable reflections on a late pamphlet entituled A history of passive obedience since the Reformation wherein the true notion of passive obedience is settled and secured from the malicious interpretations of ill-designing men.
titleStmt.author: Bainbrigg, Thomas, 1636-1703.

notesStmt.note: Attributed to Thomas Bainbrigg. Cf. BM.
Reproduction of original in British LIbrary.
